intro: Psychotria balabacensis, commonly known as the Balabac psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Philippines, specifically found on the island of Balabac. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments within lowland rainforests. Psychotria balabacensis is of interest to botanists due to its limited distribution and potential ecological significance in its habitat.
